means: （尤指营地）公共厕所( latrine的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: They made me clean out the latrines.
They were told off to clean the latrines.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被逐一派去扫厕所.

sentence.Network_en: At least 400 million are without latrines for sanitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 至少4亿人没有维护公共卫生的厕所.

PerfectNetExp.abs: emergency facilities need to be progressively improved or replaced with simple pit latrines , ventilated improved pit latrines , or poor-flush latrines as the situation develops .应急设施必须随着情况改善予以逐步改进或以简易坑式厕所、通风改良坑式厕所或节水型水冲式厕所予以替代。
after , when the scavengers came to him with grievances , he decided to try their work , scraping out latrines for nine hours a day .之后，有一天当清除污物者带着他们冤情来到他这里时，他决定去尝试一下他们的工作，每天清扫厕所九个小时。

practical measures include removing stagnant wastewater , collecting garbage a regular basis , using oil in latrines , and providing soap and sufficient water for washing .切实可行的措施包括：清除停滞不动的污水、定期收集处理垃圾、在厕所里用油以及为洗涤提供足够的肥皂和水。
If latrines are away , they will not be used., 如果厕所距离房屋太远 , 人们就不会使用它.

entry.def: A latrine is a structure, usually consisting of a hole in the ground, that is used as a toilet, for example in a military camp.

example.ex: There were no proper toilets, but only an outdoor latrine...
example.tran: 没有正规的厕所，只有一个位于室外的茅坑。

example.ex: They made me clean out the latrines.

auth_sentence.content: Latrines provide not only more privacy, but dignity as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: Latrines provide not only more privacy, but dignity as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Latrines provide not only more privacy, but dignity as well.

auth_sentence.content: But along side that we put in latrines, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: But along side that we put in latrines, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But along side that we put in latrines, he said.

auth_sentence.content: She says many of the shelters and latrines also have collapsed.
